Package com.epiphan.vga2usb

Java interface to Epiphan frame grabbers.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
DeviceType Typesafe enumeration of the device types.
Frame A single grabbed frame.
Grabber Java interface to Epiphan frame grabbers.
GrabParameters VGA capture parameters.
KVM KVM wrapper for a KVM-enabled grabber.
KVM.Key Standard PS/2 scancode descriptor.
KVM.Key.E0 Extended (E0-based) PS/2 scancode descriptor.
PixelFormat Typesafe enumeration of the pixel formats supported by Epiphan frame grabbers.
PropertyKey Typesafe enumeration of property keys.
PropertyType Typesafe enumeration of the property types.
RawFrame A single grabbed frame in arbitrary format supported by VGA2USB hardware.
ScaleMode Typesafe enumeration of scaling algorithms supported by the driver.
Size Image dimensions.
VGA2USB VGA2USB constants.
VideoMode Video mode descriptor.
 

Exception Summary
AccessDeniedException Exception thrown if network grabber is protected with a vewer password.
 

Package com.epiphan.vga2usb Description

Java interface to Epiphan frame grabbers. This functionality requires a native library provided with the destribution. Supported platforms are Windows, Linux and Mac OS X.

Version:
3.27.1
